org.rakiura.cpn.gui
Class NetToolboxApplication

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component

                      org.rakiura.draw.basic.DrawingApplication
                          org.rakiura.cpn.gui.NetToolboxApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class NetToolboxApplication
extends org.rakiura.draw.basic.DrawingApplication

Implements CPN editor and simulation toolbox. This editor allows the user to design Petri Net, dump it into XML, compile it into executable Fernlet, and run the compiled net in the debugging window (see (NetViewer.
